title: Gamification-Based MOOC Self-Regulated Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning enhancement program utilizing gamification elements in smartphone-centric resource-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies to MOOC environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can achieve over 70% weekly learning plan fulfillment rates through gamification mission completion rates
Learners can revise their learning strategies at least twice based on peer assessment feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
